alert.note: Alert for Emanuel (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 12:55AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Emanuel County through 130 AM EDT... At 1255 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Canoochee, or 11 miles northeast of Swainsboro, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Twin City, Garfield, Canoochee, and George L Smith State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
